Class Task

java.lang.Object
Task
Direct Known Subclasses:
Schedule
public class Task extends Object
Class Task is mainly used to create, modify, delete tasks. Tasks are used to generate Schedule. Tasks can be added manually by user or created from assignments existing in DB that are due less than 2 weeks.
Author:
Said
